dict.string: TruckNav Pro requires your location to provide accurate truck-specific navigation, real-time traffic updates, and turn-by-turn directions while you're using the app.
TruckNav Pro needs continuous location access to provide uninterrupted turn-by-turn navigation, track your route progress, and deliver real-time traffic alerts even when the app is in the background.
TruckNav Pro requires background location access to maintain accurate navigation guidance and provide timely traffic alerts throughout your entire journey.
TruckNav Pro needs precise location data to provide accurate turn-by-turn navigation, lane guidance, and truck-specific routing. Reduced accuracy may result in navigation errors.
TruckNav Pro uses motion data to improve compass accuracy and provide smooth camera tracking while you're driving.
